MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL36 postcode area of Tywyn, affecting properties in Happy Valley and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:44AM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs that are required to a grounded overhead cable and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:14AM on 30th January 2021.
